last_episode_to_air.name: Red Alert
last_episode_to_air.overview: With many lives lost, the mercenaries and Gautham’s gang finally get together and hatch an escape plan. But, the obstacle that stands in their way is the giant mutant monster, Vettaiyan, and his army.

name: The Village
overview: In the desolate hinterlands of Tamil Nadu, a stranded urbanite enlists the help of three locals to find his missing family believed to have been abducted by nefarious beings of a cursed village. Meanwhile, a maniacal heir to a pharma empire sends a group of mercenaries to the same village to retrieve something long forgotten. Will they come out of this terror-stricken night alive?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the desolate hinterlands of Tamil Nadu, a stranded urbanite enlists the help of three locals to find his missing family believed to have been abducted by nefarious beings of a cursed village. Meanwhile, a maniacal heir to a pharma empire sends a group of mercenaries to the same village to retrieve something long forgotten. Will they come out of this terror-stricken night alive?

episodes.name: Detour
episodes.overview: It’s 2005. A van full of people traveling from Navamalai to a city nearby is forced to take a detour through the village of Kattiyal. The van goes missing in the forests, leaving Sakthivel and Karunagam bereft with grief at the loss of their children. In the present day, Gautham and his family set off on a road trip one fateful night when a detour down the same route changes their lives forever.

episodes.name: Mission: Kattiyal
episodes.overview: When Gautham manages to find his way back along with a reluctant Shakthivel, Karunagam and Peter, his car is nowhere to be found nor his family with all signs of abduction leading them to the dreaded Kattiyal. Meanwhile, Exogenyx’s heir, Prakash’s mercenaries have landed on the coast of Kattiyal and set off into the forest on their mission.

episodes.name: Deeper into the Abyss
episodes.overview: The mercenaries led by Farhan make their way through the forests as Farhan realizes that Jagan is holding back Prakash’s actual plans. Karunagam reveals the secrets behind Kattiyal and its devastated state, Shakthi's bigoted father, Sairaj, and his descent into madness. The four men venture deeper into Kattiyal only to be attacked by mutant-like creatures that lead them to fall into a cavern.

episodes.name: Sins of the Fathers
episodes.overview: As Gautham and the gang realize they are in the old mining caverns of Kattiyal, they head deeper in and stumble into Sairaj’s new lair. The mercenaries enter the abandoned factory and find their way down to the underground lab, where they encounter a grotesque prayer altar made by the mutants.

episodes.name: Closure
episodes.overview: Meanwhile, Gautham and his group barely escape the gruesome mutant giant Vettaiyan and stumble upon a horrific tribute in the caverns for the Mother-Goddess that causes Shakthivel to spiral. The group then manages to find Gautham’s family only to be on the run from the mutants.

episodes.name: Red Alert
episodes.overview: With many lives lost, the mercenaries and Gautham’s gang finally get together and hatch an escape plan. But, the obstacle that stands in their way is the giant mutant monster, Vettaiyan, and his army.
